senses.definition: 用作連接十位與個位（若數值大於40），31至39用「#卅」表示。由於省音(elision)現象，連接十位與個位時，聲母多數會消失，從 jaa6 變成 aa6，如 87 從 /baat3 jaa6 cat1/ 變成 /baa3-aa6 cat1/。 (Used as the connection between the tens digit and the ones digit (only if the number is greater than 40). For the numbers between 31 and 39, '#卅' is used instead. Due to elision, when it is used as the connection between the tens digit and the ones digit, the initial consonant sound disappears, which sounds like "aa6" instead of "jaa6".
